geolocation.ERROR_MESSAGE: We are not able to locate your position.
geolocation.PERMISSION_DENIED_MESSAGE: It seems you did not give permission to locate you.
geolocation.POSITION_UNAVAILABLE_MESSAGE: It seems the internal source of position returned an internal error.
geolocation.TIMEOUT_MESSAGE: It seems the time allowed to acquire it was reached before the information was obtained.
geolocation.DIALOG_MESSAGE: This might affect some features of the application. Would you like to try again ?
